title: A Craven
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Anne Algar
brief_description: Smoker Jenny Craven recounts the tortuous process of quitting smoking - which is proving as difficult as they predict when everything seems to be conspiring against her. Features the voices of Jean Kitson and Brian Nankervis.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Anne Algar
